alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marshall, northwestern Beltrami and southwestern Lake of the Woods Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Skime, or 30 miles south of Roseau, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gates Corner and Malcolm around 205 PM CDT. Oaks Corner around 230 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; Lake Of The Woods; North Beltrami
